distribution.text: Copyright 2023 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for xrdp fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2022-23477: Fixed a buffer overflow for oversized audio format
  from client (bsc#1206301).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: CSAF 2.0 data is provided by SUSE under the Creative Commons License 4.0 with Attribution (CC-BY-4.0).
notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text:
xrdp is an open source project which provides a graphical login to remote machines using Microsoft Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP).
xrdp < v0.9.21 contain a buffer over flow in audin_send_open() function. There are no known workarounds for this issue. Users are advised to upgrade.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
